title: Minecraft 携带版 1.0.5 发布
author: 广药
txt_content:
本帖最后由 广药 于 2020-6-13 18:04 编辑 

正式版是Minecraft PE经过一段时间的测试版测试之后得到的稳定版本，也是众多材质、Addons、Js插件与官方领域服会逐渐跟进的版本。与此同时Google Play与App Store等官方软件商城也会推送次更新。
转载本贴时须要注明原作者以及本帖地址。


1.0.5 CHANGELOG FOR POCKET AND WIN 10
PE和Win10版本1.0.5更新日志

Command blocks, game rules and Might Morphin skins!
命令方块，游戏规则还有超凡战队皮肤！

A slew of superpowered features descend upon Pocket and Windows 10 Edition with the 1.0.5 update, rolling out across platforms today!
一大堆超能力的特效已经更新在PE和Windows 10的1.0.5版本，今天已经发布在各个平台！

As you can read elsewhere on this site, spandex-clad planetary saviours, the Mighty Morphin Power Rangers, are available as a skin pack in the in-game store - but if that isn’t power enough to satiate your appetite, then you’ll be pleased to know 1.0.5 also introduces new commands with which you can alter the very rules of the Minecraft world itself!
你可以在这看看超能战队的各种dalao，他们已经作为皮肤包发布在游戏商店——但如果那力量并不能满足你的话，你会很高兴的知道1.0.5加入了新的命令，你可以改变Minecraft世界其本身的规则！

Feel the power coursing through your fingers!
感受你指尖的力量吧！

Also, thanks to our **gent bugfixing, you will no longer get trapped and suffocate when reloading a world. So that's nice.
另外，由于我们的辛勤工作，在重新加载一个世界的时候，你将不再被困和窒息。这很nice。

Anyway, here’s the changelog!
不管怎样，这里是更新日志！

New Features:
新特性：
Power Rangers skin pack
超凡战队皮肤包
Xbox Live and Realms support on Apple TV
Apple TV已经支持Xboxlive和领域
More commands: /title, /stopsound, /playsound, /clear, /difficulty, /effect, /me, /replaceitem, /spreadplayers, /testfor and /gamerule!
更多的命令：/title, /stopsound, /playsound, /clear, /difficulty, /effect, /me, /replaceitem, /spreadplayers, /testfor 和 /gamerule
Game rules: commandblockoutput, sendcommandfeedback, drowningdamage, falldamage, firedamage and pvp!
游戏规则： commandblockoutput, sendcommandfeedback, drowningdamage, falldamage, firedamage 和 pvp！
Command blocks
命令方块
Minecart with command block
命令方块矿车





Tweaks:
调整：
Magnifying glass no longer appears over entered text in the Storage manager
在存储管理器中，输入文本时不再出现放大镜了
Jump range of magma cubes fixed to correct value (No bug ID)
修复了岩浆怪的跳跃范围（没有bugID）
Lapis lazuli icon now in enchanting tables
附魔台上现在有青金石图标了
Accuracy of fireball shots from ghasts is now correct
恶魂火球的精准度现在是正确的了

Bug fixes:
Bug修复：
Accuracy of ghast fireball shots is now correct
恶魂火球的精准度现在是正确的了
You will no longer get trapped & suffocate when reloading a world
当你重新加载一个世界时，你将不会被困或者窒息了
The beacon's position is now correct when held in your hand
当信标在你手中时，显示是正确的了
Endermen once again have idle sounds
末影人现在又有闲置音效天
Villagers no longer pick up your stuff when you die
村民不再会在你死的时候捡起你的东西了

To see a more complete list of bugs, you can find the full changelog here:http://aka.ms/mcchangelogs
你可以在这看看bug的完整修复列表和验证的更新日志：http://aka.ms/mcchangelogs

来源：https://minecraft.net/zh-hans/ar ... g-pocket-and-win-10


正版地址AndroidGoogle Play(推荐): https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.mojang.minecraftpe亚马逊应用商店: http://www.amazon.cn/mojang-minecraft-pocket-edition/dp/b00992cf6wiOSApp Store: https://itunes.apple.com/cn/app/minecraft-pocket-edition/id479516143Windows PhoneWindows Phone 游戏应用商店:http://www.windowsphone.com/zh-cn/store/app/minecraft-pocket-edition/1a625b44-b542-401b-bdff-52b4357c0573


追踪最新版本资讯，请关注Minecraft中文论坛【PE新闻资讯】版【PE版本资讯】分类

外部来源以及详细的更新条目追踪
